title: slightly glyphic sans id
content:
please help me identify this font.

Thanks.

author: Sam41

comments.content:
:^D

It’s always a special occasion when the typedesigners ID their very own typefaces.

_It’s always a special occasion when the typedesigners ID their very own typefaces._

That’s exactly what I thought and this is probably the only place where that happens.

It’s a kind of ... hmm? ... could this be ... yes! ... feeling.

I’m probably the worst type id’er ever,  
but this one was indeed not too difficult for me ;-)
